name: hideokamoto/event-publisher-on-aws
description: WordPress plugin for publishing events to Amazon EventBridge
_comment: IMPORTANT: This plugin uses ONLY dev dependencies (require-dev).
The vendor/ directory MUST NEVER be included in the plugin distribution.
All Composer dependencies are for testing purposes only and are not required
for the plugin to function in production WordPress environments.
- phpunit/phpunit: Testing framework for running unit and integration tests
- yoast/phpunit-polyfills: Polyfills for PHPUnit to support multiple PHP versions
- brain/monkey: WordPress function mocking library for unit tests without WordPress
The plugin code is entirely self-contained and has no production dependencies.
